channel.title: CVE Feed for PickPlugins -- User profile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PickPlugins -- User profile

item.title: CVE-2024-29097|2024-08-02T01:03:51.929Z -- pickplugins -- user%20profile
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins User profile allows Stored XSS.This issue affects User profile: from n/a through 2.0.20.
